name: REVOLVER CANNON
effect: This weapon does not attack allied characters caught in its area of effect.

name: EULER INTEGRATED JUMP JETS
effect: The Vanguard may hover when it moves or boost. It must end its movement on the ground or another solid surface or begin falling at the end of the turn.

name: SECONDARY JUMP BOOSTER
effect: The vanguard may immediately Jump as a free action.

name: RELOAD CYCLER
effect: If the Vanguard hasn't attacked since the beginning of its last turn, it may reload one weapon with the loading tag at the end of its turn.

name: MISSILE POD
effect: This weapon gains +1 accuracy if the target is flying.

name: CANISTER SHOT
effect: This weapon gains +1 accuracy if the target is within Range 3.

name: GOLD PLATING
effect: If the Vanguard is targeted by a Tech Attack, the attacker must succeed on a Hull save or the attack is negated. While the Vanguard is hidden, it cannot be affected by systems other than its own.

name: LASER GUIDE KIT
effect: The Vanguard targets a character within Range 25 and line of sight as a quick action; attacks against this character gain +1 accuracy until the end of the Vanguard's next turn, until line of sight with the target is broken, or until a new target is chosen as a quick action.

name: REINFORCEMENT
effect: The Vanguard loses {1/2/3} speed but gains equal armor.

name: REQUIEM CANNON
effect: When this weapon is fired, after the attack is resolved, the Bombast moves 1 space in the opposite direction of the target space. If an obstruction prevents this movement, deal {8/12/16} AP kinetic damage to that obstruction. If the obstruction is a size 1 object or piece of terrain, it is immediately destroyed.

name: BOMBASTIC PROJECTION MUSCULATURE
effect: Until the end of the Bombast’s next turn, it counts as Size 5. It is not obstructed by Size 4 or smaller characters, counts as a combined Size 5 character for determining control in a grapple, and benefits from its systems and traits as if it was Size 5.

name: GUARDIAN
effect: Adjacent allied characters can use the Bombast for hard cover.

name: HEAVY FRAME
effect: The Bombast can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked Prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

name: GRENADE PROJECTOR
on_hit: Targets must succeed a Hull save or be knocked Prone and are Impaired until the end of their next turn. On Success, they are only Impaired until the end of their next turn instead.

name: IMPACT FIELD
effect: The Bombast jumps into a target space within Range 5 and slams down, throwing up debris and shaking the ground. All adjacent flying characters must succeed on an Agility save or immediately begin falling (this does not cause fall damage), Becoming Impaired until the end of their next turn after landing, and all other hostile characters must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked back 2 spaces and knocked Prone.

name: CRUSHING GRIP
effect: At the start of each of the Bombast’s turns, all hostile characters in a grapple with the Bombast take {2/3/4} Explosive damage.

name: FULL ATTENTION SUITE
effect: The Bombast moves a number of spaces equal to its Size as directly as possible to the triggering character.
trigger: An enemy within line of sight and Sensors targets the Bombast or an ally with a tech action.

name: BOMBASTIC REEL
effect: The Bombast reels its arms back in preparation for a powerful attack; until the end of the Bombast’s next turn, the next attack it makes must be an Improvised Attack. When it does so during the duration, the target takes triple damage from the Improvised Attack and is immediately grappled on hit. All characters are aware of this.

name: COLLECTIVE FORCE
effect: The Horde’s HP is set to a number equal to the number of spaces it occupies. Its Heat Cap is equal to one half that. (Size 1=1 HP/HC, Size 2=3 HP (2HC), Size 3=9 HP (5HC), Size 4=12 HP (6HC), Size 5=19 HP (10HC).) Hordes are immediately destroyed if their Heat Cap is exceeded and they have 1 Stress.

name: GROUP OCCUPATION
effect: The Horde’s Size is increased by 1. Size 1/2 Hordes increase to Size 1.

name: COOPERATIVE NATURE
effect: 1/round, the Horde may perform one Quick Action as a Free Action.

name: TEAM TRAINING
effect: The Horde can’t take the Veteran, Elite, or Ultra templates, nor can it be taken as a part of the Squad class, and the Horde counts as a Grunt template for determining interactions with other templates.
